ngKeyup
directive in module ng

Description

Specify custom behavior on keyup event.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY ng-keyup="{expression}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
ngKeyupexpression

Expression to evaluate upon keyup. (Event object is available as $event and can be interrogated for keyCode, altKey, etc.)

Example

See ngClick
